mods.abstract: $50 REWARD. RAN AWAY from the undersigned on the 31st ult., the slave man ARCHIE, calling himself Archie Louis; about 35 years of age, with sulk expression of countenance, and rather slow of speech ; had on when he left blue blanket coat and gray cassient pants. This boy is well known in town, and is doubtless lurking about the city. The above reward will be paid for his recovery if taken out of the state, or Twenty-five Dollars if caught in town by, W.A. BROADWELL & CO., 120 Garvier street, New Orleans. Archie has a pass from J.N. Harrison, of New Orleans, to hire his time on steam-boats. Dec. 21st2wd
